title: Let's find out and see if the report system work

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/102226656/200514951?tab=overview

Will check in tomorrow and let you guys know if Pantheon got away from the 'instant feedback' with his 6 boots.

=======
Update

After a day Bard and Anivia continued to play more games, so even after feeding more than five death as a pair under 10 minutes you do not get banned. Can reds please answer?

replies.body: 6 boots is a viable build, get good.
I report every cassiopeia that buys boots, she doesn't even have legs.
How about Lee Sin with vision ward? Is that ok?

> [{quoted}](name=oops,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5aKJE3Vt,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-30T00:28:33.747+0000)
>
> Anivia though.

Very zealous of her.
Reported for not having come back in 24 hours to tell us, because Rito must do everything in this time span so must you.

Na none of them was banned, they continued to play more games so guess giving out 5 death at 5 minutes is ok guys.

Panth haven't played in 4 days, possibly banned?
Why is it that everyone seems to think that people have to be banned in 24 hours?
